value.title: Wall-climbing HB1 robot could find work in high places
value.excerpt: It's safe to say that any task which involves going up high is at least somewhat dangerous. The HB1 robot was designed with this fact in mind, as it climbs walls and even scuttles across ceilings so people don't have to.

value.title: Pittsburgh-area robotics/AI proposal named as finalist in ‘Build Back Better Regional Challenge’
value.excerpt: The Southwestern Pennsylvania New Economy Coalition’s proposal was chosen Monday as one of 60 finalists as part of the American Rescue Plan’s Build Back Better Regional Challenge, which offers up to $100 million in funding to advance a regional industry.

value.title: DRDO adding IT, artificial intelligence, robotics in tech warfare: Rajnath
value.excerpt: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh on Tuesday said that the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) is adding new chapters like information technology (IT), artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics in technological warfare.

value.title: UN head calls for action on 'killer robots' as Geneva talks start
value.excerpt: UN talks seek new rules on autonomous weapons. Activists petition states to launch binding treaty. Autonomous weapons may have been used in Libya. GENEVA: United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres has called for new rules covering the use of autonomous weapons as a key meeting on the issue opened in Geneva.
